section.title: Overview
section.p: Lawful interception is obtaining communications network data in conformance to lawful authority for the purpose of analysis or evidence. Governments around the world need service providers to install a Legal Interception Gateway along with Legal Interception Nodes. These nodes allows them to intercept phone calls, SMS'es, emails and certain file transfers or instant messages in real time.
The AF server requests the location information and the PCRF reports that location when it is received from the PCEF.

ul.li: Verify that successful location update is sent to AF when NETLOC-Untrused-WLAN (bit 30) and NetLoc (bit 10) on Gx and NETLOC-Untrusted-WLAN feature (feature bit 16) on Rx is enabled in the diameter request. Also, Specific-Action:- ACESS_NETWORK_INFO_REPORT is armed on RX.
When Trigger 43 (UE_IP_ADDRESS_LOCAL_CHANGE) is received on Gx in CCRu.
Verify that the four new AVP's (UE-Local-IP-Address, UDP-Source-Port, TCP-Source-Port, AN-Trusted) for untrusted WLAN reported to AF in Rx RAR.
